creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: embroidered vest with dyed indigo panels and black fabric panels; embroidery colors are maroon, gold, blue, green, pink and cream; front panels on either side of opening have triangle, diamond, branch and left, and zigzag designs; woven gold colored loops for brown, navy blue and white buttons; 1" wide stand-up collar in indigo dye fabric; cream colored lining under front panels; small patch of gray fabric on PR lower front panel
title: Vest (sidriye)
